Good Comments: They've done a good job. What more needs to be said? They're translating the game!

For quite a new fansubbing group, they're doing a great job. Good enough that i got their first version of CLANNAD ep 1, and decided to go along with them over Ec-SS. (which is saying alot, cause i ador them)
A lot better than Philantrophy / Sekai Fansubs. Didn't notice any spelling mistakes and the font is a lot better.
Better contrast ^-^ or something like that [I don't know how to say it xD]   they are translating Clannad game
Didnt notice any major mistakes and (ar least for episode 14) you were fast.
No one can surpass them in translating Clannad
colourful easy to read text and well translated.
They did well. they're better than the others
Bad Comments: They don't translate everything. An dango? wtf? It's supposed to be red bean...
Great subs... not best choice of text. Recommended none the less.
Good quality subs. Good sync. Simplistic OP and ED; nothing too flashy.
They are a decent alternative choice however they not as fast and started of several episodes in. ^_^
The subtitles were clean, readable, no spelling errors and they were Colorful
Good subs, SS-Eclipse may be better but these are not bad.
Dango doesn't literally translate into Red Bean. Do your research.
